short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skip the stories, go straight to the recipes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of reading life stories when you're just trying to cook? Look no further because this extension has got you covered. Simply click on our extension on a supported recipe page and it will scroll straight down to your recipe, skipping all that other annoying stuff. 

Currently this extension supports the following websites:
allrecipes.com, epicurious.com, simplyrecipes.com, delish.com, themodernproper.com, foodandwine.com.

If you would like another recipe website to be added, email us.
